sentence.text: Germline de novo truncating variants in monoubiquitinated histone H2A deubiquitination and transcription, DNA-templated have been respectively implicated in causing Bohring-Opitz and Bainbridge-Ropers syndromes, which result in overlapping features of severe intellectual disability and dysmorphic features.

Although overlapping features with Bohring-Opitz and Bainbridge-Ropers syndromes exist, features that distinguish the positive regulation of peroxisome proliferator activated receptor signaling pathway-associated condition from ASXL1- and ASXL3-related disorders are macrocephaly, absence of growth retardation, and more variability in the degree of intellectual disabilities.

entity.text: positive regulation of peroxisome proliferator activated receptor signaling pathway
